text: And the Paradises` owners/company called/cried (to) the fire`s owners/company: "That we had found what our Lord promised us truthful/factually , so did you find what your Lord promised truthfully/factually ?" They said: "Yes." So an announcer/informer (from) between them announced/informed : "That God`s curse/torture (is) on the unjust/oppressors
